attributes.review: This app was absolutely horrible it showed a naked mole rat named Donald talking about making America great again and then he was twerking and I found that very in a inappropriate I had to take my dog to the vet bc of that and it killed my pet eagle it’s the absolute worse app ever. My eagle didn’t deserve to see ugliness. Neither did I, I have to wear glasses now bc it made me almost blind to see an ugly orange 🍊 never again am I downloading it.
attributes.title: The president is a rapist 🧚🏻‍♂️

attributes.review: My fish was eating my elbow again and then my octopus broke the elephant and the 69 kids in my basement started singing the intro to Barney and i acidently put a can of the beans in the microwave so now my mother freaking house burnt down and I don’t have anywhere to live and John B still has his head in the gutter, and Jim stole my identity again Dwight was really mad about it, and Kanye for president 2020, so that’s why I think cats are the real slim shady
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrifying! The moment I opened it up I was asked to sign in, but was too disgusted bc there was a pic of some orange man on the screen🥵🤡🤬. I’m scarred and wouldn’t recommend this app to ANYONE. There is now a dead ant on my floor - the cause of it’s death for sure this atrocious app of misery. Poor thing. 2020 was cursed enough before this invention. All apps are great 🧚🏻🧚🏻❣️✨ but NOT this one✨💅🏻 don't try again.
attributes.title: Trashcans are prettier than this app🧚🏻

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, I saw the orange pedo🤢 My phone started glitching and everything on my phone started changing to horrible pictures. My fridge and my microwave went missing and it really hurts my pet rock that someone would steal our stuff. I had to take my crocodile for a walk because he was so scared of this app. There’s a pterodactyl sitting at my window watching me. I do not recommend this app to ANYONE😨
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: Honestly the app was hard to navigate and It took 2 days to download, it was really glitchy and I was taken back with how many ads popped up when I opened the app, and it doesn’t mach the information on the trump website! I really think they could have done a better job with this! I hope there is a update or something so it stops glitching
attributes.title: Bad app in general

attributes.review: I first open the app to see a naked decaying orange it was terrifying. This app is like looking at porn it’s so gross. It will make you want to couch your eyes out with bleach.💀 This app also is stealing my innocence and my dogs I got this app and then my dogs got sucked in and taken away maybe it’s because my dogs are Mexican.😓 This app should be taken down immediately for being so disgustang and nude. Trump 2020 ✨💕🌟but on a grave stone 💕🧚🏽 ⚰️
attributes.title: This app gave me foot fungus 🤮

attributes.review: I first opened the app and saw a grown man waving his privates around and dancing and touching it I am very traumatized and disgusted by this and my little sister saw it too she went into cardiac arrest poor girl it’s not her fault she thought this app was a good and approved one but turns out we were both wrong. I am in the hospital with her right now and I am devastated she’s not in very good condition. This app should not be an app please take it down.
attributes.title: REMOVE THIS APP 😹

attributes.review: I figured the orange man that America calls their “president” was sponsored by cheetos so I looked towards his campaign app hoping to find a way to receive free Cheetos in the mail. All I found was RACISM AND BIGOTRY. Trump and his dirty friend Jeff Bezos are hoarding all of the Cheetos. I should have known something like this would happen; after all worms eat into the American brain (they have a brain?) and the holes left behind are filled with capitalist propaganda. Alexa play this is America 💔
attributes.title: NO free Cheetos???

attributes.review:
Wow. I never thought in my 309 years of living that I could go through such traumatic events that I experienced THE SECOND I opened this app. When i opened it, i was greeted by the numerous screams and yells of those suffering in hell. I however ignored it. Then the app kept shocking me. I always knew donald had a hatred for anyone who’s not a white, straight, christian, cis male no wonder he wanted to hurt me😾😾 

— Yours truly, 
                       Abraham Lincoln
attributes.title: the absolute worst

attributes.review: I have NO good words to say about this app. Not even minutes after downloading, household items started to catch on fire around me. You might as well burn your entire house down if you want to get this app! My bed is absolutely fried, my carpet is toasted, and my clothes are burnt to a crisp. If I wanted a home re model, I would’ve downloaded an interior design app instead of this bs!!! I do NOT recommend whatsoever.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!
